body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Henderson Motors. My name is Alexander Henderson and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Brenda Carter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Brenda. Can you please provide me with your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven seven two - four five six - one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Brenda. And could you also share your home address, starting with the street number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's two five zero Main Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, that's all I need for now. I appreciate your cooperation, Brenda.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No problem, Alexander. I'm feeling happy with the service so far.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Brenda. Thank you for your time today. Have a wonderful day!
